summary: Two old friends meet each other 10 years after they spent summers vacations together when they were young. He was secretly in love with her.
cast: José Sacristán|Fiorella Faltoyano|Antonio Gamero|Silvia Tortosa|Héctor Alterio|Simón Andreu|Covadonga Cadenas|María Casanova|José Fernández|Pilar Lavanda|Carmen Luján|José María González Sinde|Berta Fraguas|Micaela Fraguas
title: Asignatura pendiente
